reviewText: You have lost a a a good sale do not have it in English. I was so looking so forward in buying it. Now I can not THANKS ALOT
These do not have English total rip off do not buy unless tou speak German. Total rip off!!!!

It says: Language German
Subtitles German and Dubbed Italian, English But ALL is in German.
So now i sit here with a Christmas present i can`t give to my brother because we do not speak German...:-(
Tried to call Marc & Lukas GmbH the seller in Dusseldorf to get some help, but it`always busy probably a bogus number.
So if you're not German or understand or speak the language stay away.
